IOTA's distributed ledger technology now runs on boards based on STM32 processors from STMicroelectronics. The X-CUBE-IOTA1 expansion software package for STM32Cube runs on the STM32 and includes middleware to enable the #IOTA Distributed Ledger Technology  https://t.co/sTUiN4ma4u
